description:
1) Go to System>Configurations and enable Maker-Checker
2) Enable Create client checker in 'Configure Maker Checker tasks.
3) Go to left navigation page and tap on Clients.
4) In clients list page, click on '+' icon.
5) In next create client page, enter all mandatory fields and submit it. 

Expected: After Submission, should show message, 'Waiting for Checker approval' and it must be listed in checker Inbox.
name: Mifos Android Client - Bug Fix: No pop up message shows 'Waiting for Checker approval"
